Package com.ibm.aglet.event

Interface Summary
CloneListener The listener interface for receiving clone events on an aglet.
MobilityListener The listener interface for receiving mobility events on an aglet.
PersistencyListener The listener interface for receiving persistency events on an aglet.
 

Class Summary
AgletEvent The top level event of all aglet events.
AgletEventListener The aglet event listener class is a container class for all aglet related listener.
CloneAdapter The adapter which receives clone events.
CloneEvent The clon event occurs when the cloning of an aglet is attempted.
MobilityAdapter The adapter which receives mobility events.
MobilityEvent The mobility event occurs when the aglet is about to move.
PersistencyAdapter The adapter which receives persistency events.
PersistencyEvent The persistency event
 

Enum Summary
EventType The available types of events.
